name: Achim's project portfolio
body:
### [LXC (LibXConvolver)](https://github.com/AchimTuran/LibXConvolver) LXC is a highly optimized cross platform open source library for [fast convolution](https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=Convolution#Fast_convolution_algorithms). The library has a simple API, which can be used for real application, prototyping or as a tutorial on how to use the included functions to develop more complex applications.

### [asplib (Achim's Signal Processing LIBrary)](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/) This is my cross platform C/C++ signal processing library. At the moment it includes the following features: - A cross platform biquad filter class with factory design pattern to create filters with different processor optimizations - Frame buffer, frame ring buffer and normal buffer implementations through a C/C++ template class interface - An easy to use PortAudio interface class for rapid prototyping of C/C++ audio processing algorithms - The project is still under development and features where constanly added from time to time. For more informations just follow this [link](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/) to my github.com repository.

### [adsp.template](https://github.com/AchimTuran/adsp.template) It's a framework and starting point for developing new audio add-ons for Kodi's new Audio DSP extension point. I'm still improving the code during the development of adsp.biquad.filters and adsp.xconvolver.

### [adsp.xconvolver](https://github.com/AchimTuran/adsp.xconvolver) adsp.xconvolver is convolution engine addon for Kodi's audio processing system. It's based on [LibXConvolver](https://github.com/AchimTuran/LibXConvolver), [adsp.template](https://github.com/AchimTuran/adsp.template) and [asplib](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/).

### [adsp.biquad.filters](https://github.com/AchimTuran/adsp.biquad.filters) This project is also for Kodi's audio processing system. At the moment it only contains 10 band equalizer to adjust the frequency band levels.

### My Google Summer of Code 2015 project The project has the name[Creating cross-platform room correction for Kodi](http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/proposal/public/google/gsoc2015/achim_turan/5629499534213120) and wants to optimize the audio itself during playback to perfectly fit into the environment of the listener. If you want to follow the progress on the project see my [weekly reports](http://achim-turan.de/gsoc-blog/weekly-reports/).
